links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Remains The Brand Of Choice For Teens
links.description: When it comes time to examine tech companies by how long they have been around, Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) is quickly placed into the category of those that are long in the tooth. However, the company continues to hit the right notes with younger generations, as evidenced by these rather eye-opening survey results.
